New York University Archives Audiovisual Collection

Highlights in Jazz #20: The Great Ellington Reunion / Soprano Summit - Al Hibbler, Brooks Kerr, Russell Procope, Sonny Greer, Francis Williams, Bob Wilber, Ken Davern, George Duvivier, Ken Rosengarden, Marty Grosz, Aaron Bell, Peter Dean (Tape 1 of 3)

Highlights in Jazz #20: The Great Ellington Reunion / Soprano Summit - Al Hibbler, Brooks Kerr, Russell Procope, Sonny Greer, Francis Williams, Bob Wilber, Ken Davern, George Duvivier, Ken Rosengarden, Marty Grosz, Aaron Bell, Peter Dean (Tape 1 of 3)

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers. Mild image jitter throughout. A persistent skew error exists during the first 40 seconds. Elsewhere, there are occasional mild dropouts and tape wear. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments and mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
